column","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7hchg","text":"Mobile phase Buffer A: 100mM KH2PO4, 5mM tetrabutylammonium bromide (TBA-B), (ACN)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":31,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":34,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2apma","text":"Mobile status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5hq55","text":"Heat the PI3KC3-C1 sample in a heat block at   for   to denature the protein.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":45,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":51,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"90","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"afkhl","text":"After denaturation, centrifuge the sample at   to pellet any precipitated PI3KC3-C1.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":45,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"21000","duration":900,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e3vn3","text":"Carefully transfer the supernatant containing the released nucleotide to a clean tube, leaving behind the pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9b0nl","text":"Prepare   stock solutions of ATP, ADP, GTP, and GDP standards in   HEPES  ,   NaCl,   MgCl2, and   TCEP.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":90,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":65,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":73,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":76,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":84,"length":1},{"key":5,"offset":97,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"25","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"2":{"type":"ph","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"","id":0,"number":"7.5"}},"3":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"150","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"4":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"2","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"5":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"2","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"46loj","text":"Equilibrate the C18 reverse-phase HPLC column with the mobile phase Buffer A ( and Buffer B according to the manufacturer's instructions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bnmme","text":"Set up the HPLC system with the following parameters:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1duio","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6febn","text":"Mobile phase: gradient of Buffer A to Buffer B.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4fa5g","text":"Gradient duration:   per run.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":19,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bt2rc","text":"Wavelength for detection: 254 nm.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e0qnn","text":"Inject   each of the nucleotide standards and the Protein nucleotide into the HPLC system.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":7,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"60","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fe2e8","text":"Allow the HPLC system to run the samples through the column.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"epuf8","text":"Record the retention times for each eluted nucleotide as they appear in the chromatogram.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cpntm","text":"Compare the retention times of the eluted nucleotides in the sample to those of the known standards (ATP, ADP, GTP, GDP).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"epa89","text":"Identify the bound nucleotide(s) based on their retention times in the chromatogram.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: HPLC Analysis of Nucleotides
